PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-02712011-03-03DFAIT,  ,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
Subject** ANTI-DOPING CONVENTION ** Amendments to Annex I and Annex II
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to accept, on behalf of the Government of Canada, the amendments to Annex I and Annex II of the INTERNATIONAL CONVENTION AGAINST DOPING IN SPORT. The purpose of the amendments was to update the Prohibited List – International Standard and the Standards for Granting Therapeutic Use Exemptions, both of which are annexed to the Convention.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: ** ANTI-DOPING CONVENTION ** Amendments to Annex I and Annex II
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to accept, on behalf of the Government of Canada, the amendments to Annex I and Annex II of the INTERNATIONAL CONVENTION AGAINST DOPING IN SPORT.  The purpose of the amendments was to update the Prohibited List – International Standard and the Standards for Granting Therapeutic Use Exemptions, both of which are annexed to the Convention.
